The Muse is a renovated ultra chic funky boutique hotel full of its own personality
Restaurant and bar also fun and comfortable

Overall an excellent hotel at a great location
The Kimpton Muse lived up to the chain ’s reputation for service style cleanliness and those great extra touches like the wine reception and morning coffee
